title: What is the best CD audio ripper? - Quora

response.answer_text: Although EAC is quoted as the superior ripper with adjustments for individual drive variation using a ‘Test Disc’, error correction etc. (paranoid mode). Audiocatalyst now Audiograbber is the more pleasurable to use, with a CRC file generated to check integrity. The only problem is that Windows 8+ sees it as a threat, and the .exe file gets quarantined!
I find dBPowerAmp CD Ripper to offer the best combination of convenience, reliability, and features.
